named-native-query.name: totalVendas.recuperarTotal
named-native-query.query: SELECT SUM(d.DOCVLRTOT) valor FROM DOCUMENTO d WHERE d.DOCSTA = 'E' AND d.ORICOD IN (:tipo) AND d.OPECOD IN (:operacao) AND d.DOCDATEMI BETWEEN :dataInicial AND :dataFinal

named-native-query.name: totalVendas.recuperarTotalTroca
named-native-query.query: SELECT SUM(d.DOCVLRTOT) valor FROM DOCUMENTO d WHERE d.DOCSTA = 'E' AND d.DOCSTANFE = 'A' AND d.ORICOD IN (:tipo) AND d.OPECOD IN (:operacao) AND d.DOCDATEMI BETWEEN :dataInicial AND :dataFinal
